description: A curated collection of 20 iconic weapons from video games, showcasing their significance and visual representation.

items.name: Master Sword
items.description: The legendary blade, capable of repelling evil and often required to defeat powerful enemies.

items.name: Energy Sword
items.description: A deadly close-combat weapon used by the elite warriors of the Covenant, known for its glowing plasma blades.

items.name: Frostmourne
items.description: The cursed blade of the Lich King, capable of stealing the souls of those it slays.

items.name: Dragonbane
items.description: A unique katana imbued with enchantments to deal extra damage to dragons.

items.name: Mortal Blade
items.description: A legendary crimson blade that can cut through immortality.

items.name: Blades of Chaos
items.description: A pair of chained blades imbued with fire, used to wreak havoc on enemies.

items.name: Sun Sword
items.description: A well-balanced sword used by the Warriors of Sunlight covenant and is a reward by offering 20 Sunlight Medals

items.name: Goldbrand
items.description: A legendary katana, renowned for its golden blade and powerful fire enchantment.

items.name: Caliburn
items.description: A legendary sword known for its high critical hit rate and effectiveness against dragons.

items.name: Sword of Aeons
items.description: A powerful, sinister sword that grants its wielder immense strength at a great moral cost.

items.name: Farron Greatsword
items.description: A unique ultra greatsword, combining it with a dagger allows for a fluid, dance-like combat style

items.name: Great Knife
items.description: A massive and slow-moving blade wielded by Pyramid Head, and is used to combat various enemies in the game.

items.name: Dragon Slayer
items.game_of_origin: Berserk and the Band of the Hawk (2017)
items.description: A massive sword wielded by Guts, capable of cutting through nearly anything with sheer force. It first appeared in the manga series Berserk, created by Kentaro Miura

items.name: Dawnbreaker
items.description: A divine sword blessed by Meridia, dealing extra damage to undead foes.

items.name: Soulbrandt
items.description: A cursed sword infused with the power of souls, designed to devour the essence of its victims.

items.name: Soul Edge
items.description: A malevolent, ever-hungry sword possessed by an insatiable desire to consume souls.

items.name: Sword of Justice
items.description: A mythical blade revered for its celestial aura and divine power.

items.name: Frostbrand
items.description: A magical ice-infused sword that shoots frost projectiles.

items.name: Holy Moonlight Sword
items.description: A transformed greatsword that glows with arcane energy, dealing massive damage.

items.name: Rivers of Blood
items.description: A blood-soaked katana infamous for its relentless bloodletting.
